text: Jeremiah, hagalongo mai! Digau huogodoo o tenua deenei: nia king o Judah, digau aamua, digau hai mee dabu, mo nia daangada, la ga hai baahi adu gi di goe. Gei dangi nei gei Au e hagamaaloo aga goe bolo goe gi hai baahi gi digaula. Goe gaa hai gadoo be di waahale dela ono duuli mau dangihi i golo, be di waduu baalanga, be di abaaba dela ne hai gi nia baalanga mmee. Digaula ga hagalee haga magedaa goe, idimaa, Au ga madalia goe, ga duuli goe. Ma ko Au go Dimaadua ne helekai.”
